title: 大猫科技完成近亿元A+轮融资，算力协同技术解决AI数据中心高能耗挑战
description: 本轮融资将用于能源大模型、算力协同平台、相关智能体等核心技术的自主研发和商业推广。
titleZh: 大猫科技完成近亿元A+轮融资，算力协同技术解决AI数据中心高能耗挑战
titleEn: Damao Technology Completes Nearly 100 Million Yuan Series A+ Financing, Computing-Power Synergy Technology Solves High Energy Consumption Challenges in AI Data Centers
descriptionZh: 本轮融资将用于能源大模型、算力协同平台、相关智能体等核心技术的自主研发和商业推广。
descriptionEn: This round of financing will be used for the independent R&D and commercial promotion of core technologies including energy large models, computing-power synergy platforms, and related intelligent agents. Amidst the continuous surge in total energy consumption of AI data centers and the gradual deepening of new power system construction, it will help AI data centers address the challenge of balancing energy security, economy, and sustainability.
